title: ELECTION 2008: Lipstick on the Pig
description:
By Robert David STEELE Vivas (Public Intelligence Minuteman)
Prefaces from Senator Bernie Sanders (I-VT), Tom Atlee, Thom Hartmann, & Sterling Seagraves

More info at http://oss.net/pig

Let's Lose the Lipstick, Eat the Pig, and Move On!

OPEN CHALLENGE TO CONGRESS:
Enact Electoral Reform Legislation Before November 2008 or be cast out!
1)  Include third-party candidates in all of the debates, and mandate free air time for them also.
2)  Legislatively-mandate and fully-fund Instant Run-Off for Presidential election only (this time), both to allow America to express its third party aspirations, and to provide funding for third parties in 2010. The revolution is over-Liberty won over Corruption. Mandate Instant Run-Offs for all future elections.
